files.patch:
@@ -47,2 +47,2 @@
-    @IR(failOn = {IRNode.ABS_VB}, applyIfAnd={"MaxVectorSize", " <= 8 ", "UseAVX", "0"}, applyIfCPUFeature={"sse4.1", "true"})
-    @IR(counts = {IRNode.ABS_VB, "1"}, applyIf={"MaxVectorSize", " > 8 "}, applyIfCPUFeature={"sse4.1", "true"})
+    @IR(failOn = {IRNode.ABS_VB}, applyIfAnd={"MaxVectorSize", " <= 8 ", "UseAVX", "0"}, applyIfPlatform={"x64", "true"})
+    @IR(counts = {IRNode.ABS_VB, "1"}, applyIf={"MaxVectorSize", " > 8 "}, applyIfPlatform={"x64", "true"})
@@ -52,1 +52,1 @@
-                         .lane(idx++ & 1) >= 4;
+                         .lane(idx++ & 3) == 4;
